title: Identity verification
content: Beware of scammers. Enter your email address, phone number, Telegram nickname to check if the source is verified and officially belongs to the Dust Foundation.

modal.not_verified_source_content: The source you entered is not an official Dust Foundation domain. Please be careful and only interact with verified official Dust Foundation sources.
modal.verified_source_content: The source you entered is verified and is the official domain of the Dust Foundation.
